metadata.name: Job Summary
metadata.value: With a small team of Developers and Admins we try work smart and automate our processes as much as possible. Ambitions are high and we seek smart solutions in order to grow our proposition(s). Currently we are setting up our first Mortgage product and we are looking for a AWS/Typescript developer that helps us with integrating the Solutions in our Domain.

title: Integrations Developer - AWS and Typescript

questions.label: What excites you about Knab and this Job?
